items.title: ESPN Bet is shutting down, and now ESPN is partnering with DraftKings
items.summary: ESPN Bet is winding down in favor of a new integration with DraftKings. items.title: Just $16 gets you this tiny new USB-C 7,000mAh mini power bank with display today (46% off)
items.summary:
LISEN 7,000mAh USB-C mini power bank

Buy for $16.50 (Reg. $32)

Enter promo code D4VX5G6N for $7.20 off.

What we love

The new LISEN power bank is a great choice if you want a compact battery pack for quick top-ups. It includes a built-in Type-C connector compatible with a wide range of devices, a 7,000mAh battery, a protective silicone cover for the connector, and a small display that shows the remaining charge. Another good thing about this unit is that you can use it charge your phone without a cable, as the connector plugs directly into your device’s Type-C port.

items.title: Nancy Pelosi, first woman to serve as US House speaker, to retire from Congress
items.summary: WASHINGTON (Reuters) -Nancy Pelosi, the first woman to serve as the powerful Speaker of the U.S. House of Representatives, said on Thursday that she will not run for re-election to Congress in 2026, ending a four-decade career of a progressive Democratic icon often vilified by the right. This is originally a $1,300 machine that hit the scene last year as one of the first Copilot+ laptops on the market with Qualcomm’s Snapdragon X Elite chip. It has lately been fetching close to $1,200, and today’s deal – which is also matched at Walmart – shaves $420 off that usual going rate. This is the lowest price we have tracked for this Snapdragon X Elite-powered Windows Copilot+ PC, and it’s now going for $20 less than its previous all-time low and our mention from earlier this year.
